from collections import Counter
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        left,right = 0,len(nums)-1
        diffNums = [0]*(k+1)
        while left<right:
            mi,ma = min(nums[left],nums[right]),max(nums[left],nums[right])
            length = max(ma-0,k-mi)
            # 只需要改变一次的区间
            diffNums[0]+=1
            # 需要改变两次的区间
            if length!=k:
                diffNums[length+1]+=1
            # 对于diff来说不需要改变，减一
            diff = abs(nums[right]-nums[left])
            diffNums[diff]-=1
            if diff!=k:
                diffNums[diff+1]+=1
            left+=1
            right-=1
        ans = diffNums[0]
        for i in range(1,k+1):
            diffNums[i] = diffNums[i-1]+diffNums[i]
            ans = min(ans,diffNums[i])
        return ans
